results.title: [Lactic acidosis associated with metformin].
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@Lactic acidosis@@@ is an extremely rare but serious complication of treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. In order to avoid @DISEASE_Lactation_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D007775 @@@lactate acidosis@@@, it is important to select @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ correctly and to ensure that contraindications such as cases of @DISEASE_Hypomagnesemia_5_Renal_with_Ocular_Involvement @DISEASE_MESH:C565423 @@@renal involvement@@@, advanced age and @<m>DISEASE_Hepatitis_Alcoholic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006519 @@@chronic alcoholism@@@ are observed prior to treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

results.title: Metformin beyond diabetes: new life for an old drug.
results.text_hl: On the basis of our investigation, the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can be suggested in overweigth @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ affected by @DISEASE_Glucose_Intolerance @DISEASE_MESH:D018149 @@@impaired glucose tolerance@@@ and/or fasting hyperglycaemia and in subjects affected by @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovary syndrome@@@, while further data are needed in order to prescribe such a drug in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ affected by @<m>DISEASE_Hepatitis_Alcoholic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006519 @@@non-alcoholic steato-hepatitis@@@ and in @SPECIES_11676 @@@HIV@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ on antiretroviral therapy.
